resources.string: Investing has never been easier! I am using the Tarrakki app to invest, You should try it out. Towards Prosperity!
Are you sure you want to exit?

Financial goals assist you in making small, regular investments towards fulfilling your dreams. Tarrakki Goal Setting helps you make time-bound, risk-evaluated investments aimed at giving you the returns you need to achieve your goal. Select a goal and get started.
Our Recommended Fund for this Strategy
To own your dream home, your goal is to reach about \u20B93.95 Lakh. This means investing \u20B92.85 Lakh over the next 5 years, including a one-time lumpsum of \u20B910,000 up front.

Tarrakki helps you invest your hard earned money in mutual funds that best fit your income, age, and risk appetite. 

Watch your money grow beyond the rate of inflation. 

Achieve life goals and financial milestones faster. 

- Paperless Investing 

- Direct Plans (No Agent Commissions)

Rural invest is an initiative by Tarrakki.com along with 4 promising young entrepreneurs - Satyam, Naman, Raghav & Madhav. 

 Today, India has the world’s largest rural population, which is yet to be tapped to its fullest potential. There exists a pertinent lack of financial planning in rural Indian households. According to a recent survey conducted by SEBI, less than 1% of rural people invest in financial instruments. Out of 13,697 respondents, only 35 have some formal financial investments, which is a mere 0.23%. Thus, financial literacy is a big challenge for the rural population in India; however, it also plays a crucial role in the economy’s prospects. 

 We intend to inculcate a habit of saving in our country’s rural population so that they can make financially informed goal-oriented decisions towards securing a better future for themselves & their family. It is because the financial situation and behavior of rural households not only affects their livelihood; it also has a significant influence on the stability of the financial system and future economic growth of the country. 

 However, the behavior of rural household investors regarding saving & investment behavior is inconsistent and unpredictable because of the lack of financial education, impoverished lifestyle, unstable occupation, and fluctuating income. They are not able to save their money due to these irregularities, and even if some households save, it is usually informal savings in the form of cash, which might pose liquidity challenges during unexpected situations like Demonetization or COVID-19. Lack of awareness about ways & benefits of investing in financial assets leads to an increase in informal savings & investments, which ultimately does not contribute to the capital formation of the country. 

 Thus, we decided to start Rural Invest, an initiative like Rural Invest which is the need of the hour to leverage finance’s power to empower and tap the untapped Indian rural market. Rural Invest aims to spread awareness about financial literacy amongst rural households & inculcate the habit of saving & investing. Thus, Rural Invest is an effective avenue for Rural India for saving, borrowing, investing, and mitigating future financial risks, thereby also ensuring access to liquidity in times of distress.
This fund aims to achieve long term capital appreciation, predominantly through investments in equity and equity related instruments of Mid Cap companies.
Disclaimer: Expected returns are not guaranteed. The above calculations are based on historical returns. Investments are subject to market risk.

Why does the Inflation Rate matter?

The house that costs 60 lakhs today, used to cost 10 lakhs, just 20 years ago. How much is it likely to cost in the next 10 years? \n\nWhen you make an investment for a future goal, you want your future re-turns to be at par with the going market rates of that time. The inflation rate is calculated based on various fiscal parameters, to ensure that the return on your investment remains relevant in future.

Electronically validate your NACH mandate. Authorize your NACH mandate by entering your net-banking or debit card details. It takes 3-7days for the mandate to be accepted.

We provide the easiest way to do the NACH Mandate by generating the pre-filled e-Mandate form for you. All you need to do is take a print, sign the form, and upload it on the app. It will take 10 to 45 days for the approval but you can choose any maximum mandate limit.

Download the bank mandate form and fill out your details to set up Auto- Payments. This form allows secure auto-debiting of a specified amount of money towards your SIP, to create an easier investment experience for you.

Once you have filled out the bank mandate form, please scan the form and upload it.\nIn case your phone has a low quality camera, please download the CAMSCanner or Office Lens App from the Google Play Store, to scan the Bank Mandate.
Please look at the pre-filled Bank Mandate carefully to verify that all the in-formation is correct.\n\nDownload the Bank Mandate and Print.
Please double check that all information is correct and your signature is legible before Submitting the Bank Mandate.
Normally takes 10-45 working days for approval.
Normally takes 7-10 working days for approval
Normally takes 7 working days for approval

Before opting for an investment strategy, rethink your priorities as practi-cally as possible. 

If you are investing in order to grow your money significantly in the long run, you may need to have a higher exposure to direct equity (stocks). This would require you to opt for an Aggressive or Moderate Investment Strategy. This also means that you may see the value of your portfolio go down, based on market conditions. The key to grow your money is to not get sentimental when markets dip, because markets that dip, inevitably rise again. 

If the safety of your invested money and capital protection in the near future is very important to you, you might want to opt for a Conservative Investment Strategy. While your money will grow very slowly with this strategy, it will also be less likely to see major ups and downs irrespective of market conditions.

When you make an investment in Nippon India Liquid Fund using Tarrakki, you are eligible to apply for a Nippon Anytime Money Card, powered by Tarrakki, Nippon India Liquid Fund, and Visa.

This card is linked to the Nippon India Liquid Fund investment, and allows you to instantly withdraw or spend money against your mutual fund investment. The card is valid at Visa enabled ATMs and merchant outlets all over India.

This card will be shipped to the address mentioned as per your KYC records.

A small processing fee of Rs %s will be charged when you complete your debit card application.
Your card will be sent via mail to the address mentioned in your KYC application starting with

When you park your money in Tarrakki Zyaada, your money will be invested in the Nippon India Liquid Fund, which can give you potentially higher returns than your Bank Savings Account or a Fixed Deposit. 

With your Tarrakki Zyaada investment, you get a Nippon Anytime Money Card, powered by HDFC Bank and Visa. This card enables you to use the money you have invested, should you want to. You can link this card to your online shopping account, use it for your Uber/Ola rides, and even book movie tickets online. It literally acts like a Bank Debit Card. 

This card is linked to your investment in Nippon India Liquid Fund and allows you to instantly withdraw or spend money against your Mutual Fund investment. This card is valid at Visa enabled ATMs and merchant outlets all over India. There are no charges of using the card at any ATM or Visa point of sale in India. Tarrakki charges a one-time card processing fee of Rs %s when you apply for the Visa Debit Card. These fees help us provide you the best customer support. 

It's like parking your money in a bank savings account, but with the opportunity to earn almost double the returns.
Potentially Higher Returns than your Savings Account or Fixed Deposit
Debit card powered by HDFC Bank & Visa towards your investment

In the last 25 years, markets have gone through many ups and downs. They have fallen and recovered multiple times. 

 But, in the long run, those who remained invested through the ups and downs have emerged as multi-millionaires. 

 Those who redeemed or stopped their investments because of market dips, simply missed the bus.

Note: Redemptions made outside of the Tarrakki app (ATM or Using your Debit Card) will take T+3 days to update under the portfolio section. You can check the current value of your Tarrakki Zyaada investment at Nippon AMC\'s Website

As per government guidelines, it is mandatory to complete your KYC('Know Your Customer') in order to invest in Mutual Funds. 

This is a one-time process. Once your KYC is complete, you will be able to invest any Mutual Fund of your choice in India. 

You will now be re-directed to our KYC partner - ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund to complete your KYC
